version_description:
In this new version of the My Banglalink app, you will find below new features:

• Advice of charging information for internet packs and services
• Redesign of special offers
• Share application via Facebook, twitter, email, and messaging
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Control version to upgrade

• Share application via Facebook, twitter, email, and messaging
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Control version to upgrade

• Advice of charging information for internet packs and services
• Redesign of special offers
• Share application via Facebook, twitter, email, and messaging
• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Control version to upgrade

• We have made some small changes in the App to make everything simpler, faster and better
• This release has Mobile Financial Services and free access to key Government sites under Free Zone
• We also fixed the bug of crashing on Banglalink Internet.

Amar Offer – Shake phone to reveal exciting offers.
Check the remaining balance of your active bundles.
Fresh new design.
Easy navigation.
Improved App Performance

•New user-friendly interface : With a more organized new interface, customers can easily find all the offers and services at one place.

•Self-services: Customers will be able to buy all the Minute/Internet/Mixed/SMS bundles from the revamped MyBL App. They can also avail the following services whenever needed:

* Buy Amar offer more conveniently
* Recharge balance
* Take emergency balance
* Check balance
* Purchase internet pack
* Check latest offers
* Check usage history
* View USSD code list
* Manage FNF list

Improved Accessibility
* Use the App even when you run out of internet
* No need to remember your password to login each time, just use OTP to login!

Enjoy Exclusive Bonuses
* Get 25MB bonus internet on log-in everyday
* Get 100MB bonus internet on sign-up
* Avail exclusive bonuses on applicable offers!

Have not signed up yet? Click on the Store icon and install MyBL App. After successful sign up, enjoy 100MB bonus. So, go ahead, earn your free internet and celebrate the happiness of surfing with Banglalink!

If you have any queries regarding MyBL App, please contact our Banglalink support team: info@banglalink.net
